Reference

Initialise

Initialise shi18ny package in the UI of the app.

useShi18ny()

Initialize shi18ny

Translate

Translate text in UI and Server of Shiny app.

i_() ui_()

Translate text

Select/update language

Select language for translation of text in Shiny app.

langSelectorInput()

Language selector input

langSelector()

Language selector

uiLangUpdate()

Update language in UI translations

Misc

Package info and examples

availableLangs()

Display available languages

runExample()

Run one of the shi18ny examples.
